about_the_game:
A warlike race of aliens, having captured another planet, broke through a wormhole to planet Earth. On the ground, they divided the territories with impenetrable domes and connected them with teleports. You were given a special suit in which you can move through teleports. Your task is to find the wormhole and destroy it.
Peculiarities:
-18 types of weapons.
- More than 10 Maps.
- Limited ammo.
- To go to the next level, you need to charge the suit with dark energy.
Cold calculation and a keen eye will help you in the battle against alien invaders.
Charge your suit with dark matter and jump into the teleporter.
detailed_description:
A warlike race of aliens, having captured another planet, broke through a wormhole to planet Earth. On the ground, they divided the territories with impenetrable domes and connected them with teleports. You were given a special suit in which you can move through teleports. Your task is to find the wormhole and destroy it.
Peculiarities:

- More than 10 Maps.

- To go to the next level, you need to charge the suit with dark energy.
Cold calculation and a keen eye will help you in the battle against alien invaders.
Charge your suit with dark matter and jump into the teleporter.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: ntel® CPU with at least 4 threads, 2.3GHz or greater (or similar AMD CPU)
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD RX 480 4GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel® i7 5820K (or similar AMD CPU)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

short_description: Wormhole: Battle for Planet Earth - This is a fantastic third-person action game. In the game you are waiting for aliens, teleporters, dark matter and hurricane action.
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
